author: bainbrid
body:
@Sam-Harper @mverzett 
This is the PR we should review before going to RECO.
It's a WIP, so there will be more commits in the near future.
In the meantime, I'll be annotating certain parts of the code where I have questions. 
I'll be in touch when I think it's ready for your review.
title: LowPtElectrons (WIP)
